content:
1. You must have at least 40 BCOIN to claim.
2. Must have at least 5 BCOIN in the Wallet to be able to claim.

Claim under 60 BCOIN pays 10% tax.
Claim 60 to less than 80 BCOIN pays 6% tax.
Claim over 80 BCOIN pays 3% tax.

BCOIN can only be withdrawn/deposited while logging in to the BNB network

You can claim BCOIN in deposit without fees, observe the following rules:
1. Must have at least 5 BCOIN in the wallet.
2. Each claim must be at least 1 BCOIN.

BCOIN can only be withdrawn/deposited while logging in to the BNB network

1. You must have at least 40 SEN to claim.
2. Must have at least 5 SEN in the Wallet to be able to claim.

Claim under 60 SEN pays 10% tax.
Claim 60 to less than 80 SEN pays 6% tax.
Claim over 80 SEN pays 3% tax.

SEN can only be withdrawn/deposited while logging in to the BNB network

You can claim SEN in deposit without fees, observe the following rules:
1. Must have at least 5 SEN in the wallet.
2. Each claim must be at least 1 SEN.

SEN can only be withdrawn/deposited while logging in to the BNB network

1. You must have at least 40 SEN to claim.
2. Must have at least 5 SEN in the Wallet to be able to claim.

Claim under 60 SEN pays 10% tax.
Claim 60 to less than 80 SEN pays 6% tax.
Claim over 80 SEN pays 3% tax.

SEN can only be withdrawn/deposited while logging in to the POLYGON network

You can claim SEN in deposit without fees, observe the following rules:
1. Must have at least 5 SEN in the wallet.
2. Each claim must be at least 1 SEN.

SEN can only be withdrawn/deposited while logging in to the POLYGON network
1. STAR CORE is obtained from Treasure Hunt mode of Bombcrypto BNB and Polygon network.\n2. STAR CORE is used to buy Chests in the SHOP\n

1. You must have at least 40 BCOIN to claim.
2. Must have at least 5 BCOIN in the Wallet to be able to claim.

Claim under 60 BCOIN pays 10% tax.
Claim 60 to less than 80 BCOIN pays 6% tax.
Claim over 80 BCOIN pays 3% tax.

BCOIN can only be withdrawn/deposited while logging in to the Polygon network

You can claim BCOIN in deposit without fees, observe the following rules:
1. Must have at least 5 BCOIN in the wallet.
2. Each claim must be at least 1 BCOIN.

BCOIN can only be withdrawn/deposited while logging in to the Polygon network
BHero S is used for mining tokens in Treasure Hunt mode (Polygon Network).\nBHero S can only be withdrawn while logging in to the Polygon network.\n
BHero S is used for mining tokens in Treasure Hunt mode (BNB Chain network).\nBHero S can only be withdrawn while logging in to the BNB Chain network.\n

Auto Mine is the feature that let Heroes automatically go Home or Rest then go back to work.

Price of 2 Auto Mine packages:
7 Days = 12% of total tokens mined in the last 7 days (Minimum cost = 10 BCOIN).
30 Days = 35% of total token mined in the last 7 days (Minumum cost = 30 BCOIN).

Auto Mine is the feature that let Heroes automatically go Home or Rest then go back to work.

Auto mine will also let your Heroes mine while offline more than 1 hours. Maximum 48 hours

Price of 2 Auto Mine packages:

7 Days: 0.075 TON Deposit

30 Days: 0.3 TON Deposit

- Only S Heroes can mine Base and Ranking Rewards.
- Stake BCOIN into Legacy Heroes base on their rarity 
to upgrade them into S Heroes.
- S Heroes can mine Star Core and tokens corresponding to the tokens staked in this hero.
Minimum deposit amount 27
